q: the congressman's decision to forgo a presidential run and instead turn his attention toward a possible gubernatorial run. One source who met with Mike Pence several times over the last few months tells NRO the conservative Hoosier was extremely torn while he deliberated. Another who met with Mike Pence feels his heart was never completely in a bid for president. Someone close to Mike Pence explains that "the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from

the first time, someone caught up in the 2012 media cycle stepped up and made an intelligent decision. That person? Mike Pence , who told the world that he would the Indianapolis Star reported: "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012."" Mike Pence is a bear of little brain

I sat down and talked with Andy yesterday. He had a whole list of things that he thought I needed to do. It's good because without that I wouldn't see it or I wouldn't know, so that gives me guidance, areas to work on. Michael Vick admitted that he tried too often to make a big play last season. provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of last season. The deal will be announced on Thursday. "We're real excited about it," chief executive officer Rob Vito said Tuesday. Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person. Before his 2007 arrest on dogfighting charges, Michael Vick was the NFL's highest paid player and had numerous endorsements. Vito said Michael Vick is the company's first corporate spokesman. Terms of his deal weren't disclosed

On how not making any money on Android doesn't matter...( 6:12 in) We make zero. It's free. That would be the definition of no margin.... I have been surprised at how important Android is to our business, but for none of the reasons that you all[ in the media] talk about. It's fundamentally because Android is seen as representative of the new model of computing.
